newsitem.title: USA: Potomac Electric Q1 revs lower, net rises.
newsitem.headline: Potomac Electric Q1 revs lower, net rises.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTES: Contributing to Potomac Electric Power Co's 1997 Q1 results were earnings of $0.11 a shrae from it subsidiary, Potomac Capital Investment Corp. These results compared with a contribution of $0.02 a share for the 1996 Q1. In the current Q1, Potomac Capital realized after-tax earnings of $7.4 million ($0.06/share) from aircraft-related transactions, and gains of $3.4 million ($0.03/share) upon early redemption of preferred stock investments.
